flavorText: As the Adversary's forces descended upon the gala, Elspeth whispered to Giada, "I can get you out of here, but we have to go now."

name: Daring Escape
originalText: Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. Scry 1.

rulings.text: If the target is not legal as the spell would resolve, its controller does not get to scry.
